description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2004年提出的一种社会发展战略目标，指的是一种和睦、融洽且各阶层齐心协力的社会状态。
description.en: A socio-economic concept in China that was promoted by the Communist Party of China in 2004, referring to a state of society that is harmonious, friendly, and where all social classes work together.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会第四次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会第四次全体会议
en: Fourth Plenary Session of the 16th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次中央委员会全体会议，会上首次正式提出“构建社会主义和谐社会”的概念。
description.en: A plenary session of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China where the concept of 'building a socialist harmonious society' was formally proposed for the first time.

nodes.id: 中共中央关于构建社会主义和谐社会若干重大问题的决定

zh-cn: 中共中央关于构建社会主义和谐社会若干重大问题的决定
en: Decision of the CPC Central Committee on Several Major Issues Concerning the Construction of a Socialist Harmonious Society

description.zh-cn: 由中共十六届六中全会通过的，对“和谐社会”提出明确定义的文件。
description.en: A document passed by the Sixth Plenary Session of the 16th CPC Central Committee that provided a clear definition of the 'Harmonious Society'.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会第六次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会第六次全体会议
en: Sixth Plenary Session of the 16th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次中央委员会全体会议，会议通过了《中共中央关于构建社会主义和谐社会若干重大问题的决定》。
description.en: A plenary session of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China which passed the 'Decision of the CPC Central Committee on Several Major Issues Concerning the Construction of a Socialist Harmonious Society'.

description.zh-cn: 源于孔子的中国古代思想体系，其伦理和社会秩序思想影响了“和谐社会”构想。
description.en: An ancient Chinese system of thought originating with Confucius, whose ideas on ethics and social order influenced the concept of a 'Harmonious Society'.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期的思想家，儒家学派的创始人。
description.en: A philosopher of the Spring and Autumn period and the founder of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个时期，战乱频繁，是孔子生活的时代背景。
description.en: A period in Chinese history characterized by frequent warfare, which formed the backdrop for Confucius's life and work.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一项以经济建设为中心的国策，其带来的社会不公等问题是“和谐社会”理念提出的背景之一。
description.en: A national policy of the People's Republic of China centered on economic development. The social inequality and other issues arising from it were part of the context for the proposal of the 'Harmonious Society' concept.

description.zh-cn: 中国社会发展的阶段性目标，“和谐社会”被认为是其继承和发展。
description.en: A milestone goal for China's social development, of which the 'Harmonious Society' is considered a continuation and development.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆网民创造的网络用语，为“和谐”的谐音，用以讽刺中国网络审查制度。
description.en: An internet slang term created by mainland Chinese netizens, a homophone for 'harmony' (和谐), used to satirize the internet censorship system in China.

nodes.id: 整治互联网低俗之风专项行动

zh-cn: 整治互联网低俗之风专项行动
en: Special Campaign to Rectify Low-Taste Content on the Internet

description.zh-cn: 中国政府为创造“和谐社会”而进行的一系列互联网内容整治行动。
description.en: A series of internet content regulation campaigns conducted by the Chinese government to create a 'Harmonious Society'.

description.zh-cn: 中国网民创作的虚拟动物形象，用以讽刺政府的互联网审查行动。
description.en: A fictional creature created by Chinese netizens to satirize government internet censorship campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第四代最高领导人。“社会主义和谐社会”是在其任内提出的重要执政理念。
description.en: The fourth paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. 'Socialist Harmonious Society' was a key governing philosophy proposed during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2004年提出“和谐社会”作为一种社会发展战略目标。
description.en: The Communist Party of China proposed the 'Harmonious Society' as a strategic goal for social development in 2004.

description.zh-cn: “社会主义和谐社会”是时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛主政时期提出的重要执政理念。
description.en: The 'Socialist Harmonious Society' was a key governing philosophy proposed during the tenure of Hu Jintao as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会第四次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在该次会议上，中国共产党首次正式提出了“构建社会主义和谐社会”的能力的概念。
description.en: At this meeting, the Communist Party of China formally proposed the concept of 'building a socialist harmonious society' for the first time.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会第六次全体会议
relationships.target: 中共中央关于构建社会主义和谐社会若干重大问题的决定

description.zh-cn: 该次会议通过了《中共中央关于构建社会主义和谐社会若干重大问题的决定》。
description.en: This session passed the 'Decision of the CPC Central Committee on Several Major Issues Concerning the Construction of a Socialist Harmonious Society'.

relationships.source: 中共中央关于构建社会主义和谐社会若干重大问题的决定

description.zh-cn: 该决定对“和谐社会”提出了明确定义，进一步推动了该理念的实施。
description.en: This decision provided a clear definition for the 'Harmonious Society' and further promoted the implementation of the concept.

description.zh-cn: “构建和谐社会”的主张被认为是以中国传统的儒家思想来治理中国社会的一个构想。
description.en: The proposal to 'build a harmonious society' is considered a concept for governing Chinese society based on traditional Confucian thought.

description.zh-cn: 孔子提出了一整套人文和社会思想，经过后来的发展，被称为儒家思想。
description.en: Confucius proposed a comprehensive set of humanistic and social ideas that, after later development, became known as Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 孔子生活在战乱频繁的春秋时期，这个时代背景影响了他提出旨在构建社会秩序的思想。
description.en: Confucius lived during the turbulent Spring and Autumn period, and this historical context influenced his formulation of ideas aimed at establishing social order.

description.zh-cn: “和谐社会”的提出旨在解决改革开放过程中产生的社会不公等问题。
description.en: The concept of 'Harmonious Society' was proposed to address issues such as social injustice that arose during the process of Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: “和谐社会”被认为是“小康社会”的继承和发展，在经济要求之外，对政治、文化、社会等方面提出了新的定义。
description.en: The 'Harmonious Society' is considered a continuation and development of the 'Moderately Prosperous Society', adding new definitions for political, cultural, and social aspects beyond economic requirements.

description.zh-cn: “和谐社会”概念的提出和相关网络审查的实施，导致中国大陆网民创造出“河蟹”（和谐的谐音）一词及其相关网络用语，用以讽刺言论审查。
description.en: The proposal of the 'Harmonious Society' concept and the implementation of related internet censorship led mainland Chinese netizens to create the term 'river crab' (a homophone for harmony) and related slang to satirize censorship.

relationships.target: 整治互联网低俗之风专项行动

description.zh-cn: 政府为了创造“和谐社会”而进行了整治互联网低俗之风专项行动。
description.en: The government launched the 'Special Campaign to Rectify Low-Taste Content on the Internet' in order to create a 'Harmonious Society'.

relationships.source: 整治互联网低俗之风专项行动

description.zh-cn: 大陆网民创作“草泥马”等虚拟动物形象，是对政府为创造“和谐社会”而进行的“整治互联网低俗之风专项行动”等举措的讽刺。
description.en: Mainland Chinese netizens created virtual animal figures like the 'Grass Mud Horse' as a satire of government measures such as the 'Special Campaign to Rectify Low-Taste Content on the Internet', which were carried out to create a 'Harmonious Society'.
